title: [Large-scale] Online Library Education Design and Mathematics Curriculum-Integrated Project Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: A process where pre-service teachers apply systematic instructional design to plan library-integrated mathematics lessons. Operated in online/asynchronous learning environments utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can systematically explore digital/physical resources in the library for a mathematics problem-solving project.
Learners can apply an ADDIE model-based instructional design framework to develop integrated mathematics-library lessons.
Learners can create online educational materials (videos, worksheets) incorporating learner feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
